Title: Hey! Mr. Pibb!
Plot: Patty works to clear Daniel in his wife's murder; Ellen and Tom go to West Virginia to gather vital information in the case against Ultima National Resources.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Michael Nouri, Zachary Booth, Salvatore Inzerillo, Tom Noonan, Darrell Hammond, Delaney Muro, Paige Turco, Brett Cullen, John Doman, Michael Pemberton
